Negative_Review: Service was appalling throughout the stay Poor bar service ignored yet overstaffed breakfast service was chaotic and housekeeping asked us to leave an hour before checkout twice
Positive_Review: Decent location and hotel in good condition

Negative_Review: The reception staff never there had to wait for so long and when someone is there they re quite rude no smile no eye contact Asked for an iron many time many occasions but never received one So I had to wear my creased clothes
Positive_Review: We ve payed for the breakfast but we only had it once as it very poor quality there s barely anything to eat Very disappointed

Negative_Review: When booking the room several months in advance we have asked for a room on some of the top floors the view was the main reason to choose this hotel Nevertheless we have been given a room on the 8th floor out of 23 or so with a very poor view For sure we were disappointed in this respect
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel very close to metro bus taxis very lively with lots of restaurants and bars and the Montparnasse tower

Negative_Review: Most staff at Breakfast not friendly Food either run out or often cold though had plenty of selection just not enough for the amount of customers More often than not would run out of either plates cutlery or mugs cups for hot drinks Basically they are not able to cope with the high demand
Positive_Review: Fantastic location to metro and train stations

Negative_Review: Doesn t deserve a 4 star rating The staff were very unfriendly and not welcoming at all The restaurant floor was badly stained and breakfast service was appalling too impersonal like going into a canteen The front of house and hospitality was non existent The bedrooms were very dark and gloomy the shower head kept falling down so you couldn t have a shower One of the toilets didn t flush No complimentary water in rooms The restaurant was closed for dinner Wifi connection was weak
Positive_Review: The bedroom sizes were good clean and the beds were comfy but high The speaker system in suite was great One of the rooms had an English socket Liked the ice machine near the lifts

Negative_Review: The room smell like cigarretes it was a family room and the room had no smoking sign on it yet it smelled very bad Asked the staff about it but didnt do much
Positive_Review: The bed was extra fluffy and nice for family

Negative_Review: While the hotel was lovely for the most part we found the restaurant lacking in service and cleanliness Things seemed very disorganized while we were there with dirty dishes left on tables and messes left at the buffet It was difficult getting the attention of anyone if we needed something so we just did it ourselves Believe it or not we could not connect our adaptor in the bathroom so I could use my hot curling brush for my hair They only had something for men s razors which seemed very odd to me I ended up sitting on the floor near the bed doing my hair in front of a tiny mirror as all the outlets that took adaptors were on walls away from mirrors
Positive_Review: The Pullman Montparnasse was a lovely hotel with nicely appointed rooms It s a bit of a ways from everything so taking the train is a must if you are planning to tour all over the city The gracious lady who checked us in was very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Phone not working Reported it no response in 2 hours When room was cleaned tea coffee milk were not topped up Had to constantly go downstairs as phone was not working to ask for milk and coffee Took an hour for it to arrive
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: there was an ice machine on floor but had to ask for containers to get it in also TV did not always work also phone did not work to call desk but we just let it go even though they offered to fix it tea coffee service in room not stocked first day
Positive_Review: great breakfast buffet included

Negative_Review: No babies with me so I didn t need what I found in the refrigerator a half empty bottle of milk and some yogurt nothing else I would have been happy if i needed a coffee stick for the next day I found one on the floor Waited in vain for someone to check out the room after I called several times I had to pack and make another visit to reception to nicely ask for another room at 11 PM I got another room where was not possible to watch all the tv channels At the check out they offered me a bus ticket or a coffee seriously for free for making up the incident
Positive_Review: I have no idea

Negative_Review: It is difficult to find something not to like The only thing that could be improved is the lobby
Positive_Review: The beds were cloudlike and the view over Paris exquisite

Negative_Review: For a hotel of your calibre it is sad to see paper cups in rooms instead of China cups probably a cost saver but not a good look and not pleasant for clients to drink out
Positive_Review: Comfy beds fluffy croissants good breakfast selection excellent service from your staff and Concierge especially Greg who was most patient with us We have had a most enjoyable stay thank you

Negative_Review: Staff service skill complaining with Working condition or It issue in front of costumer s Eventhough it could be true the costumer s should not heart that
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Room was t really clean when i arrived I had leftover tea and coffe sachets with no setup for a new guest arriving Called the reception they asked me to come down to change the room This is might be ok in France to ask a guest to come down to change his room when you checked him in a dirty room Where i come from and when you have such unfortunate issue where hotel does a mistake at least a manager calls to aplogize and send a team member to change the room I am a big fan of Pullman as a brand and this is my 3rd stay at Pullman Montparnasse and maybe 50th stay in Pullman brand in general worldwide was a letdown this time
Positive_Review: Location and large rooms compare to similar hotels in Paris Large screen to watch football Great coffe in lobby bar Great public areas and nice seating Good vibes in general with nice movments

Negative_Review: The room was not well cleaned the fridge of the minibar was not working neither coffee nor tea nor a bottle of water were provided unstable WiFi
Positive_Review: Spacious room comfortable bed good bathroom helpful staff

Negative_Review: The number of hotel staff needs to be increased as there are so many rooms Or they should improve the efficiency of the staff On arrival we waited for more than 30 minutes standing in lines to check in On top of that there are many group tourists as well so the lobby is always crowded and noisy And the breakfast is not cheap but its quality is less than mediocre
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: not a lot of choices at breakfast buffet but the food quality is good Paris standard We enjoyed our breakfast there everyday very much the area is safe close to metro a lot of nice bistros nearby so you still have a lot of choices for dining out even if you come back late

Negative_Review: I think I can write a big essay here Service does not match with its name brand I dont usually use hard words but service everywhere in the hotel was pathetic Reception told us that we get 2 bottles of water per person per day but the guy at room service would only give 2 bottles 1 plain and 1 sparkling It s kind of compulsory to take sparkling so you cannot get two normal water and he made a big fuss out of it either you take this or i am going breakfast was another struggle i ordered omelette which took 20 mins and then came a wrong one Then i requested to get hot water for tea as we had to wait a long time for the omelette then came the right omelette but 20 mins to bring hot water so omelette got cold and they were not even apologetic Staff behavior was such that at times it was close to being rude Room service was ultra slow they forget things to bring with breakfast and then would take long time to bring which spoils your mood for breakfast meal the cleaning people would call 10 times for room make up even when you tell them that we will let the reception know and even after informing they entered our room for cleaning while we were there I have a long list and can go on mainly related to service It is a big hotel and you as one customer do not mean much to them I guess As I said only because of Nima we managed to have good time at the hotel
Positive_Review: The only good thing worth mentioning or praising at Pullman Paris was the gentleman at the information desk named Nima He is an amazing individual excellent in dealing with requests and has answers to almost everything He helped us in everything during our stay we would have struggled big time if he was not there A big thank you sir for making our stay really good otherwise we would be regretting for paying so much just to stay in one okay sized room The facility is modern style so the room and bed was good the bathroom however needs some attention as the shower was broken and door lock did not work View from the room was good Location is really good you can walk around and there are so many options for shopping food etc Family friendly place

Negative_Review: Service in Cafe Atlantic for an evening meal was extremely poor twice had to ask for a menu and then i was kept waiting for 20 mins before I could order a meal
Positive_Review: Receptionist very helpful and pleasant and got a great room overlooking Montparnasse Tower

Negative_Review: We had issues with noise from the rooms either side of us We had an adjoining door on either side of the room with no insonirisation we could hear everything that was being said including a crying baby which woke us during the night and children playing all afternoon so no catch up with a snooze in the afternoon and we couldn t complain to the neighbours as babies cry and children play that s normal We wrote to the management about this they answered more or less satisfactorily The hotel was very full due to a handball competition We were there to relax it wasn t relaxing but we ve stayed in this hotel many times with no issues so all in all we won t change we ll definitely refuse a room with adjoining doors though next time
Positive_Review: Big rooms great view this is why we ve stayed here many times super breakfast

Negative_Review: The electricity on the desk was not working and although I complained and they said they will fix it this did not happen The room was dark because one of the lights was not working It was not fixed In general the maintenance looks poor and we received a so called clean Bath Towel that had blood stains This was very unpleasant and we are considering after 30 years to move to another hotel when coming to Paris
Positive_Review: I have been coming to this hotel for about 30 years so we are used to the location and the hotel itself

Negative_Review: More varieties for those who do no eat meat and poultry More egg dishes More varieties Black tea was not very good
Positive_Review: Fruites Corwason Corn flakes

Negative_Review: I understand that the staffs of the breakfast restaurant were very busy however many tables and buffet table weren t clean enough
Positive_Review: Location is perfect

Negative_Review: We booked Paris view room with high price but hotel didn t prepare Paris view room for us They say it was just a request and they do not have a responsibility to keep a Paris view room for us So there s no sense to book a Paris view room with high price
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It is an amazing hotel very clean with tremendously comfort with a romantic view of the eifel tower with wonderful breakfast excellent staff very good location and quiet I would go back to this hotel s price with bases of amenities is very reasonable

Negative_Review: Rooms were very warm Would have been nice to be able to open a window Bar was very expensive even considering the Paris prices
Positive_Review: Great breakfast and location

Negative_Review: Small toilets and poor quality of cups tea and coffee making facility They charge for even a set of cutlery and small things Overall experience is good
Positive_Review: Best about this is location and area

Negative_Review: I was asked to pay extra 30 for early check in check in is at noon and I got to hotel at 11 It is rip off not customer service
Positive_Review: Place of the hotel is great near to metro stations Stuff is friendly room clean

Negative_Review: There was smoking on our floor despite being assured it was a non smoking room Received 6 am wake up call on a Sunday despite not ordering one Cleaners started banging on the door at 8 30 Came 4 times despite my telling them we were trying to sleep Paid 26 Euro for coffee and croissant as rest of breakfast was rather sparse and somewhat disgusting Bar was functional but not comfy Hotel designed for people with kids
Positive_Review: Location good Price great Room functional and clean

Negative_Review: Long wait for the elevator due to a conference of some sort that was taking place Other than that my family and I enjoyed our stay at the Pullman Paris Montparnasse
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and the view was GREAT The breakfast croissants were AWESOME The staff was very friendly helpful and knowledgeable They were able to tell me where places were that I wanted to visit and even gave me directions to the nearest ATM machine

Negative_Review: Rooms were very warm and with the aircon turn on it was very dry Just wish I could open a window 1 small beer and a coke was 14 euros
Positive_Review: Location is great

Negative_Review: Short stay in Paris
Positive_Review: The location of this property is very nice Few steps to the central metro station and surrounding is full of restaurants and bars Free shuttle to and from SIAL Food show was remarkable as SIAL is one of the largest food shows held after every year in Paris It attracks thounsands of exhibitors buyers and traders from all across the world I was pleased to avail this shuttle service every day Kudose to their team for

Negative_Review: Rude staff Appalling levels of service Maid came in each day without knocking or noting the Do Not disturb Union aggressive protest threatening guests demonstration
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Room too small they wanted to invoice me more than I paid on Booking com eventually lady at reception called someone and then all was okay yet quite annoying such lack of organization
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: We only had disposable cups in the bedrooms which were not replaced when the room was cleaned
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly helpful The beds were extremely comfortable the food was perfect

Negative_Review: We booked a room through Booking com but they were unaware of any reservation we waited even check in about 1 hour were in the ordinary confusion it was the same at check out the receptionist wanted to charge us 30 EUR more than we had and We waited 30 min poor service WiFi was at a luxury hotel too weak Facebook Messenger does not work Breakfast very poor no vegetables
Positive_Review: receptionist named Erasmo very kind and polite

Negative_Review: the bar was very expensive for a beer but i did kind of expect that still would definitely recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent great range of foods

Negative_Review: Reervations were messed up when we arrived full payment paid at time of booking but charged an additional 100 in dispute currently We reserved two rooms for two nights each when we arrived we were told we only reserve one room the first night if I had not had my reservation paperwork we were going to be charged again Ultimately it was discovered they misspelled our name on the second reservation But we had to prove everthing we were wrong and the front desk office were right Sad part is we spoke french realatively well and this was a return visit to this hotel because of the past service Disappointed at the lack of accountability and reservation accuracy
Positive_Review: Rooms were as comfortable as remembered and beautiful views

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room had a beautiful view and very clean I loved the pillows and duffets The staff was friendly very helpful and accommodating for anything that we needed Definitely would stay there again and refer my friends Thank you

Negative_Review: The room was not very clean with stains on the carpet and down the fridge door The TV did not work as a result of which we shared out first evening with a technician in the room for over one hour attempting repairs One of the drawers in the room would only close if manipulated Probably the main issue was that the room we were in had a connecting door to the room next to it and as a result we could hear the conversations of the people next door and their television which they left on one night until 3 00 am the next morning One of the reasons for selecting this hotel was that we had stayed their the previous year and found it very good This time we considered it to have deteriorated and represented poor value for what is quite an expensive hotel We will not be staying their again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the lady marcelle in reception was so sweet and pleasing and friendly She made us feel so much at home and we really began our holiday so nicely She was exceptional and made a big difference to our enjoying the stay

Negative_Review: There was a kettle and cups for coffee and tea to be served in the room but the coffee box was empty for 5 days no one fill it also I used one of the glasses and it remained dirty for 5 days without washing it Although the internet was free but the service was very poor and hardly connecting to the internet
Positive_Review: location and reception staff were helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I liked the Pullman I have stayed in it twice and I will certainly stay again when I come to Paris The hotel is nice The location is excellent And it is a good value for money KR Firas Fallouh

Negative_Review: There was no pool
Positive_Review: The bed is the most comfy bed I ve ever slept in The staff were amazing very friendly and helpful the went over and above and made us feel very welcome

Negative_Review: Suggestion of which metro exit to use when first arriving at Montparnasse would help future first time arrivals
Positive_Review: Helpful staff enabling us to continue our journey with ease

Negative_Review: The toilettes were not clean as well as the bedroom There were stains on the wall The breakfast did not have a variety of selection It was the same breakfast for 5 days
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The room is very small The beds are not very comfortable And they do not change the complimentary coffee and tea daily
Positive_Review: The hotel is located next to a Metro station Bus Stop Area is quiet with not much noise

Negative_Review: It s looking a bit tired scuffed doors stains on carpet Wouldn t pay full price
Positive_Review: Handy for montrepanasse train station Walk into centre of Paris in 30 mins

Negative_Review: The bar area and lobby are very pleasant but the prices at the bar are eye wateringly expensive e g 19 for a margarita The mini bar prices even more so 15 for cashew nuts 7 for a mineral water There are however plenty of shops and bars nearby
Positive_Review: This was my second trip to the Pullman It s a lovely hotel perfectly located in the Montparnasse area and very convenient to the metro and train stations The room was very clean and comfortable with great views of the city There are some nice touches like a robe and slippers Staff are very helpful and friendly It was good value also Breakfast was included and was decent cold meats cheese fruit cereals croissants and various breads

Negative_Review: 1 The front entrance needs a really good clean up Smoke pervades the atmosphere around doors urine stains on front steps not washed in our four night stay Needs a good high pressure washer 2 Concierge refused to book us a restaurant one evening 3Faulty bedlamp only fixed after 3 complaints 4 Consumables in room not replenished 5No bottle opener in room 6 Security only beefed up after a conference started none on our arrival
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed in a large room bathroom needs renovate get rid of high jump bath obstacle Breakfast staff really good Reception staff helpful and efficient on book in out matters Nice garden beside breakfast room shame it was so neglected

Negative_Review: on very busy mornings there could have been more staff in the breakfast room tables took a long time to clear when busy
Positive_Review: great variety of breakfast always fresh and inviting staff multilingual very friendly and helpful great location for trains and buses great local cafes stores and supermarket close by as well as atms

Negative_Review: Not really city centre with Paris traffic took around 15 20 mins taxi ride from main shopping area champ de elysees galery laffayette
Positive_Review: Modern hotel with friendly staff many resto nearby one chinese fine dinning resto 2 mins walk

Negative_Review: Tea and coffee making facilities poor paper cups and limited supply of tea and coffee Had to request additional from reception Same in bathroom Surprising for a hotel of this standard
Positive_Review: Beds very comfortable Good location Efficicient and friendly counter staff

Negative_Review: Multiple country electicity adaptors on the main desk in the room In fact there were no electricity facilties at the main desk and one had to work with a computer on the bed side Further an effort should be done to vary the menu on the breakfast I did 6 days with the same breakfast menu Rather boring
Positive_Review: Location clean good sized rooms not noisy

Negative_Review: Old rooms not that great compared to other Pullman Bercy Defense etc certain staff were like robots no human touch inflexibility of staff Too expensive for the service not worth it
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The bar lacked intimacy and was more like an airport waiting area
Positive_Review: An upgrade to a superior bedroom extremely comfortable bed Excellent s advice and support from concierge Location

Negative_Review: You always have to pay for extras like breakfast and parking
Positive_Review: Offered me an upgrade without me asking for it Huge facility Number of choices for restaurants Parking availability Staff is friendly

Negative_Review: What I didn t like was more about Paris not the hotel per se Not a very safe city especially after 9 Phone got stolen on the first day in Paris from Montparnasse station
Positive_Review: Great location Just 5 min from Gare Montparnasse Area too is pretty safe The hotel is simply awesomme

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Stayed across busy 6 Nations weekend but service was excellent from Front of House to cleaning staff to breakfast Big hotel but caters for numbers very well Would happily recommend though hotel bar expensive 14 for a pint

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: Lovely helpful staff excellent location for my purposes the airport buses stop right across the street and one of the main train stations Montparnasse is steps away I only tried the more casual downstairs restaurant I forget the name and thought the food was very good and not to expensive The excellent cappuccino however WAS expensive

Negative_Review: Not enough coffee tea milk Not enough towels we had to ask for more Not enough toiletries Breakfast very expensive
Positive_Review: Super views from the hotel Very comfortable beds with good quality pillows Staff very helpful and friendly Great location Good wifi

Negative_Review: The towels were old and not having a fresh feeling Toilets are so small and congested Even though the room was clean but didn t give a fresh feeling The breakfast was not up to the standard
Positive_Review: nothing

Negative_Review: Checked in and when we got to the room the bed was broken Called reception and had to change room We also had issues with the safe in the room as the battery was flat Surprised these type of issues are not reported or picked up before rooms are allocated to new guests A little dissapointed given its a 4 hotel
Positive_Review: Great location as a base to explore Second time I have stayed here

Negative_Review: Exit from Metro station nearby can be taxing if you carry luggage as there are too long with lot of steps to climb Taxis are better if you reach from Paris Nord station
Positive_Review: Spacious rooms extra cozy beds cleanliness excellent breakfast spread not far from city centre and easy reach and availability to metro taxis and restaurants expecially

Negative_Review: room s not as big as I imagined we booked the room was a superior queen room I thought it would be quite large but it was not The price was quite high according to the room standard
Positive_Review: Good location train station tube station are only a few minutes walk from hotel great staff and service there nice and be patient and their English is of fluency and easy understandable good city view from the window

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The service received was excellent from breakfast to Concierge Reception to a late night drink at the bar the staff were professional and catered to every need Thank you

Negative_Review: Did not like the bedroom although bed was comfortable Was expecting a 4 star or better but the bedroom and hallways gave it a 3 rating Staff at the welcome desk did not smile at all
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Dissappointed NO ONE replaced burned out bulb outside room2236 after I reported 2 times Breakfast buffet was near bad Would be happy to discuss with you Need more staff to support breakfast rush 22d floor ice machine broken
Positive_Review: The lobby staff were professional Very nice porter helped move our luggage across street to airport bus Much appreciated

Negative_Review: There were two negatives that I saw First there were long strands of hair found in the bathroom on our first night That is always a stickler for me to find someone else s hair in the bathroom Also the furniture in the rooms were filthy so we didn t use them They need to be replaced
Positive_Review: We were greeted with friendly faces upon our arrival and throughout out 3 night stay The breakfast was great This hotel was only a few blocks from the Hop On Hop Off Bus stop so it was really convenient There was also an airport bus shuttle that took us there and returned I would stay again

Negative_Review: Breakfast was rather disorganized and they were very slow to replace items that had run out
Positive_Review: Great location Friendly staff Comfortable if small room

Negative_Review: The morning buffet breakfast did not have fresh eggs when I order them
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful when called upon at the reception and Club accord Room service was also good

Negative_Review: On the contrary the parking should be free for Pullman s clients And of course I should mention that you have to improve your s food
Positive_Review: It is very convenient area a lot of restaurant next by metro station and a small supermarket as well The breakfast it really beyond imagination

Negative_Review: Cold ambience Very professional but nothing personnal or cozy Room was not very clean with dust on higher levels
Positive_Review: Proximity to public transport Many restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: Our bedroom door was open very early in the morning despite a do not disturb sign on the door We immediately called reception but received no feedback Still waiting for their email a week later
Positive_Review: Good location with good breakfast

Negative_Review: amenities in some rooms are not to par All plugs are at floor level no facilities to recharge your phone and your laptops Most of the staff polite and friendly always some exception with attitude The WIFI is extremely week
Positive_Review: location and the beds are great Nice pillows and sheets Breakfast is good excellent croissant very good Nespresso machines even if you have to lineup sometimes

Negative_Review: WiFi reception was poor Would have been nice to be able to choose sub titles on TV channels where English not available
Positive_Review: Great location Great view Very comfortable rooms Great breakfast

Negative_Review: Staff Feels like staff discriminate and not helpful at all They are not nice all especially when check in I chose 4 stars hotel but staff seems like 1 2 or no star hotel Should educate and train staff to be more service mind Also internet not work well in room and have to stay nearby the door
Positive_Review: Location Near Train Station

Negative_Review: Upon arrival after a long flight with the family at around 22 30 very quite in the lobby not a single of the five doormen chatting inside helped us with the doors or bagages Room was not to four stars expectations i e dirty walls and stained chairs coffee tea set worthy of a two star hotel Unfriendly concierge Employees don t seem to like their jobs nor their working place
Positive_Review: The location was very good as well as the receptionist and barman

Negative_Review: The hotel was very crowded so we had to wait longer than usual for front desk and concierge assistance and for the elevators
Positive_Review: The room was very clean the bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was spacious Great view of Paris from our room

Negative_Review: Internet connection is a real issue it take long BKFST restaurant is like a huge factory too many people too much noise would be a good idea to offer another option less crowded
Positive_Review: Location which is very convenient

Negative_Review: The first morning the shower was cold We were reassured this was not a common occurrence and an apology was given in writing to everyone in the hotel For the rest of our stay we had hot water but no plug for our sink despite asking for one
Positive_Review: The breakfast was lovely the staff attentive and the room comfortable The view over Paris from our room was brilliant Very good travel connections from the location We enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: Had to walk perimeter of very large lobby to get to front desk rather than walking through it large seating area was walled off from front desk
Positive_Review: Near train station we needed for next part of trip several good cafes restaurants within walking distance Pantheon Luxembourg Gardens friendly concierge staff

Negative_Review: Only one member of staff was rude but apart from that everyone else was extremely happy to help and they were very friendly
Positive_Review: Clean Lovely views Breakfast was lovely had there was great variety

Negative_Review: They had too few staff members at the reception we always waited several minutes for help The room service was very expensive the room service food was average The room was a bit dirty pretty much had all of the walls filthy spots
Positive_Review: Montparnasse is very central We got a good price for the hotel The breakfast was good

Negative_Review: Staff appeared not to understand English Taxi drivers were very rude and gave the full tour of Paris to get to your desired location at max cost
Positive_Review: Lobby was well appointedone the desk staff were efficient

Negative_Review: Very bland Americanised part of Paris in the immediate vicinity of the hotel
Positive_Review: Size and quality of room Location next door to Montparnasse station was a plus for us

Negative_Review: Only News channels on the TV in English unless we used the pay to view option A few minor niggles in the room but for the price we paid all insignificant
Positive_Review: Perfect for our deal we got upgraded to a superior room upon arrival Thank you for a lovely stay

Negative_Review: Very disappointed in the wi fi connection While receiving sending emails was no problem backing up to icloud took forever to the point that it was useless
Positive_Review: Can t beat the location Airport bus directly across the street ditto train station Easy access to not only metro lines but also to several bus lines so you can see the city Did not have hotel s breakfast as it s too expensive and who wants to eat that much at breakfast Lots of cafes near by including in the station where we had cafe creme and croissants

Negative_Review: When checking out there was extra 20 on the bill when i queried this i was told that the booking com price was an estimate i don t believe this to be true as i have booked with you many times before i would like your feedback on this
Positive_Review: Nice rooms good location we would try pullmans in other cities

Negative_Review: Absolutely nothing
Positive_Review: Excellent location modern hotel with ample amenities and decent sized rooms The staff were great and the breakfasts were plentiful loved the breakfast room with all the windows and nature outside One of the best moderately priced hotels we ve experienced in Paris

Negative_Review: i thought the breakfast was ok but over priced I ve had much better food for less money in other Paris hotels 78 for three of us Trop cher Also not a great view from our room 815
Positive_Review: For a big city centre hotel the staff at reception were outstanding Genuine welcome helpful and very pleasant 10 out of 10 Could not have done more to make us feel welcomed and relaxed The hotel is just opposite Montparnasse station which was very handy for our early train to St Jean de Luz Montparnasse area is surprisingly nice Cemetery is well worth a visit and close to Jardin du Luxembourg St Sulpice brilliant

Negative_Review: The information staff were very rude and of little help To make a cup of tea there was no tea bags in the room and when asked I was given 2 tea bags plus 2 paper cups to drink out of For a high class Hotel they really need to lift their game I definitely would not recommend this accommodation to anyone I was surprised that Avalon Cruises used this accommodation as they always have first class accommodation
Positive_Review: The locality

Negative_Review: Tea coffee provided in room could have had normal cups rather than take away ones But it wasn t a prob really All smokers were standing far too close to the entry doors one had to hold their breath to avoid inhaling smoke
Positive_Review: Good location staff very helpful Great room great beds

Negative_Review: soundproofing is very poor the sound of TV from next room can be heard very vividly
Positive_Review: location is excellent airport shuttle bus stop and metro station are very near from hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were booked into another hotel which my husband had booked as a surprise for my 50th birthday When we got there we were shocked at the lack of cleanliness so left straight away and booked this hotel in the hope it would be nicer It was lovely and the staff were great so my 50th birthday surprise was a success Thank you

Negative_Review: only that our room had no view of the Eiffel Tower and no pool
Positive_Review: We loved the Pullman friendly staff great location that s safe and great restraints near Eiffel Tower and the bed was amazingly comfortable the only down fall was that the bathroom wasn t the newest but good and would of loved a pool as it was hot and no beach near but was a very pleasant stay close to train buses hop on hop off I would defiantly come back and recommend to anyone coming to Paris

Negative_Review: Flow problem with the sink in the bathroom and it deserves renovation too bad for this level of hotel at this prices range Otherwise the room is correct and clean
Positive_Review: Warm welcome friendly staff excellent location amazing breakfast

Negative_Review: Can be very expensive 7 Euro for a coffee on room service Toilet wall was dirty Only given cardboard take away type cups for coffee tea in room These were not replaced after the first day and had to ask for replenishments and you only get one each so had to reuse Windows were dirty exterior Hotel bar very expensive Free cable TV only had news channels all others were not English speaking Tried to charge us on check out for items from minibar that were not used Requested a high room but only got 10th floor
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful but not overbearing Reasonably large room Good location

Negative_Review: Vegetarian Breakfast Overall breakfast was brilliant However I am guessing that is quite normal unless the hotel explicitly specifies such
Positive_Review: Everything was good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Easy access to airport bus Good location for Gare Montparnasse metro bus Found wi fi a bit slow but free Didn t have breakfast as its almost 30 pp went to near by cafes for 8 pp which is fine

Negative_Review: Literally the only slightly annoying thing was that they had advertised a Sunday kids Brunch but we were told when we arrived that wasn t on during August due to staff holidays so we didn t get to try that might have been nice to know in advance especially as we had booked with kids a bit so we could enjoy a lazy sunday brunch them in the hotel
Positive_Review: Wow what a stunning place the hotel was so beautifully designed and located in a great spot We didn t know Paris at all and we found the metro right outside the front door perfect only a handful of stops and we were at the eiffel tower We had an amazing lazy Sunday morning walking round the local art fair at Monparnesse its was a perfect over night we wished we could have stayed longer We will defiantly be going back

Negative_Review: The old bath room used to be cleaner But with the new bath room there are too much dirt around which I had never seen before at the old batch room I think the dark tiles are causing the cleaner to clean properly all the corner of the batch If Pullman does not start cleaning properly the bath room and remove all those dirt in the corner it won t be long before the whole new bath room is completely unacceptable and will turn this hotel rate to 2 or 3 stars My recommendation will be to have white tiles as before so that the cleaner could see clearly and clean properly Or if Pullman wants to keep the current dark tiles then instructions must be given to all cleaners to clean properly the bath room especially all corner where the bath and tiles meet furthermore Pullman must have clean bath curtain in the bath to prevent water watering all over the floor and the sink desk something we do not see with the old style bath room whoever design this new bath room made mistake but it can be managed if my advices are taken into consideration or else my wife and I will never sleep there again I have using this hotel since 2000 from the time of Meridian to Pullman but this is the first time I had to complain
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Wifi is expensive whereas this should be included as it is in all hotels we stayed so far
Positive_Review: Very attentive staff For example the reception lady suggested getting a baby bed which we did not think of She was very welcoming and knew what we needed before we asked Finally rooms are soundproofed which is great for getting a good rest

Negative_Review: Complicated Wifi you have to enter your email each time you want to go online very annoying house keeping staff they keep coming in even with the do not disturb sign on the door they knock very loudly and systematically open the door without respecting guest s privacy Sewer smell coming out from the air conditioner
